content.html: Log4j recap - two random unpaid folk maintain the code - a random requested the vuln/feature in 2013 - major IT and security vendors rely on that code - problem was publicised by teens in Minecraft video game - scope of problem still unclear days later
content.value:
Log4j recap

- two random unpaid folk maintain the code 
- a random requested the vuln/feature in 2013
- major IT and security vendors rely on that code 
- problem was publicised by teens in Minecraft video game 
 - scope of problem still unclear days later
